RESOLVED_ENTITIES.United States District Court: United States Department of Homeland Security
RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the vehicles: RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s vehicle and IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s vehicle

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jorge Luis Trevino: United States Border Patrol agent who testified about the characteristics of Farm-to-Market Road 2050 and his experience with vehicles in the area
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Farm-to-Market Road 2050: Paved road with two lanes, one in each direction, and no shoulder, where United States Border Patrol Agent Jorge Luis Trevino encountered the defendants' vehicles
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s vehicle and IGN: Vehicles involved in the incident, including a white Malibu sedan and a black Dodge pickup truck, stopped near the Border Patrol Station Parking Lot, suspected of transporting illegal aliens
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Department of Homeland Sec: Law enforcement agency involved in the incident
